    Features

    Keep Your Clothes as Fresh as Your Look

    Refresh, deodorize and more - all with the power of steam. Enjoy advanced fabric care at home for the ultimate laundry solution.

    A Reflection of Your Taste

    LG STUDIO Styler’s mirror door finish elevates your space and adds fashion function with a full length reflection. It’s the perfect addition to a closet suite or the finishing touch on your dream laundry space.

    Gorgeous on the Outside. Spacious on the Inside.

    Keep your clothes looking their best—quickly dry delicates and other wardrobe staples without the fear of shrinking or damage from high-heat dryers.

    Refresh With Steam, Every Day

    Caring for your favorite wardrobe pieces and for more fabric types is easy with the gentle power of steam.

    Just Plug In & Start Refreshing

    Plug into an outlet, fill water container & start refreshing. No plumbing required.

    Smarter Style Ahead

    Use the ThinQ® app to check remaining cycle time, download cycles and more.

    A Smarter Home Starts with the LG ThinQ® App

    The ThinQ app1 offers control and convenience for smart LG appliances to help you simplify life and enjoy the comforts of home. Manage and monitor your Styler remotely, track and download cycles, connect with Google or Alexa voice assistants, and access smart diagnosis customer support, and more. Learn more.

    Request a Repair

    When it comes to investing in laundry appliances, you want the most reliable laundry machines for your home and lifestyle. LG Laundry Sets are long-lasting and built to allow you to complete more loads of laundry in less time. LG Laundry Appliances, including LG Washers and Dryers, are designed to be energy and water efficient and come in a variety of colors, sizes, and styles.

    LG’s line of Laundry machines offers innovative features including front-load and top-load LG ThinQ washer and dryer sets with varied capacities, steam technology, 6Motion wash cycle technology, TubFresh technology, Direct Drive motors, TurboWash technology, and TrueBalance. LG Laundry features are dynamically designed to help you get the job done quickly and efficiently.
